___^_.description: Any property starting with _ is valid.

___distFolder.description:
Local distribution folder with built assets ready for publishing

E.g.: `./dist`

___webpackItemsMap.description: Scripts build configuration. Array or entry/target script pairs.

___name.description: Description of the configuration, doesn't effect on logic

___target.description:
Relative path to output bundle script within `./dist/stripts` folder.

E.g.: `app.js`

___entry.description:
Relative path to .ts, .js file within the project's folder structure.

E.g.: `./src/scripts/index.ts`

___bundleJSLibsFiles.description: 3-rd party JavaScript libraries and scripts bundle configuration. Array of local path to .js files.

items.description: Relative local path to a .js file (EcmaScript 5) to bundle into vendor.js file.

___modulePath.description: Relative path for module inside dist structure, e.g. `modules/my-module`

___deleteFiles.description: Delete remote files on local files unlink event

___customStyles.description: Custom styles bundle configuration. Array or a single object element src/dist pair of source style entry point and output bundle file

___name.description: Description of the configuration, doesn't effect on logic

___src.description:
Source entry point path relative to './src'

E.g.: `styles/index.scss`

___dist.description:
Output .css file path relative to './dist'

E.g.: `styles/myModule.css`

___devtool.description:
Webpack `devtool` option for development mode

E.g.: `eval`

See more: https://webpack.js.org/configuration/devtool/

___name.description: An optional name for custom action

___copyAssetsMap.description: Custom assets copying to './dist' rules definition. Array of src/dist pairs objects.

___name.description: Description of the configuration, doesn't effect on logic

___src.description: Is an array of paths to folders or files. Folders and files are copied based on this array, subfolders are created automatically

items.description:
Relative local path to a file of folder.

E.g.: `./node_modules/datatables/media/images` or `./src/scripts/modules/wysiwyg.js`

___dist.description: Target destination folder path where files are copied to. In most cases it should be `./dist`.

___spFolder.description:
Publishing SPWeb-relative folder path in SharePoint where files should be uploaded to

E.g.: `_catalogs/masterpage/spf`

___filesMetaData.description: gulp-spsave filesMetaData property, see more https://github.com/s-KaiNet/gulp-spsave

___fileName.description:
File name with extention (without path)

E.g.: `app.js`

_____metadata.description: SharePoint REST API OData entity type

___bundleCSSLibsFiles.description: 3-rd party Styles libraries bundle configuration. Array of local path to .css files.

items.description: Relative local path to a .css file to bundle into vendor.css file.

___masterpagePath.description:
Relative to publishing folder path to custom masterpage.
Is used in `gulp masterpage:apply` task.

___logoPath.description:
Relative to publishing folder path to custom logo.
Is used in `gulp masterpage:apply` and `gulp logo:apply` tasks.

___masterpage.description: Custom structure object which properties can be used while compiling masterpage's .hbs.
